service.name: "InAcademia"
service.description: "From cloud services to tickets to pizza, commercial providers want to offer great deals. InAcademia offers a simple, cost-effective, lightweight validation system to replace the time-consuming scanning and checking of ID cards."
service.targetUsers: "Identity Providers, Campus CIO/Identity provider managers, Commercial Service Providers"
service.userValue: "InAcademia leverages the power of eduGAIN and the Identity services of the students’ institution to securely authenticate a student’s affiliation credentials. InAcademia provides the merchant only with a simple “Yes/No” response and no personal information is shared."
